title: Social media links in Community section and Footer

requirements.summary: Render five social platform items in the Community section as outbound links opening in a new tab while preserving existing neon/glow responsive styling.
acceptanceCriteria: The Community section (frontend/src/components/Community.tsx) shows 5 distinct items: Discord, Instagram, Facebook, Twitter/X, and Reddit.
Each item is clickable and navigates to its configured URL using an anchor/link behavior (not a no-op button).
Each outbound link opens in a new tab and uses rel="noopener noreferrer".
User-facing labels are spelled correctly and in English (e.g., "Twitter/X" or "X").
Layout remains responsive and visually consistent with the existing Community card styling (neon/glow theme).

file_operations.description: Replace the current 3 CTA buttons (Discord, Twitter/X, Telegram) with 5 social link cards/buttons (Discord, Instagram, Facebook, Twitter/X, Reddit) rendered as real outbound anchors (<a>) using target="_blank" and rel="noopener noreferrer". Keep the existing Card layout and neon/glow styling by continuing to use shadcn-ui Button/Card composition (e.g., Button with link behavior/asChild if supported). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Centralize Community social URLs into a single configuration and ensure empty URLs render as disabled/non-clickable items without breaking layout.
acceptanceCriteria: Community component has a single, clearly named configuration object/constant for the five platform URLs.
If a URL is empty or undefined, the corresponding UI state is non-clickable/disabled and clearly indicates it is unavailable (while preserving layout).

file_operations.description: Create a single configuration export (e.g., COMMUNITY_SOCIAL_LINKS) that defines URL placeholders/constants for Discord, Instagram, Facebook, Twitter/X, and Reddit (default to empty strings). This file is the single place to update channel/profile URLs.

Refactor to import the centralized social URL config and drive rendering from a single data list. Implement a disabled/unavailable state when a URL is empty/undefined (non-clickable, clearly indicated, while preserving the same grid layout and visual consistency). Continue using shadcn-ui Button/Card styling patterns without modifying files under frontend/src/components/ui. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Update Footer Community links to match the supported platforms and link externally (not #community) using the same configured URLs.
acceptanceCriteria: Footer community links (frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx) include Discord, Instagram, Facebook, Twitter/X, and Reddit.
Footer community links open the configured external URLs in a new tab with rel="noopener noreferrer".
Footer no longer lists platforms not requested (e.g., Telegram) unless explicitly retained in addition to the requested ones.

file_operations.description: Update the Footer Community link list to include exactly Discord, Instagram, Facebook, Twitter/X, and Reddit. Import the centralized social URL config and render each as an external anchor with target="_blank" and rel="noopener noreferrer" (remove Telegram and stop linking to #community for these items).
